text: The Site can only access the information from a cookie sent by the Site.

FunnelFLARE also may disclose aggregated user statistics in order to describe our services to potential advertisers, partners, other third parties, our affiliate companies, and for other lawful purposes.
In such cases, we ask that you register and provide us with basic information on our registration page, or sign in if previously registered.
Third-party vendors, including Google, use cookies to serve ads based on someone's past visits to the FunnelFLARE subscribers website.
FunnelFLARE uses cookies to track usage of the Site and further personalize your experience when you are visiting the Site.
FunnelFLARE logs IP addresses, or the location of your computer on the Internet, for systems administration and troubleshooting purposes and to determine site usage.

In addition, other sites may use the Site's or FunnelFLARE's name.

While visiting any FunnelFLARE hosted webpage, we may ask you to register and/or provide information that personally identifies you ("Personal Information") for purposes of interacting with the FunnelFLARE subscriber.
